H 1,3,5: 20 MT/M2

DECK: 1.0 MT/M2
HATCH COVER: 1-5   2.3 MT/M2
SPEED AND CONSUMPTIONS:
AT SEA:
(BALLAST) ABT 12.0 KTS ABT 16.0 MT VLSFO
(LADEN) ABT 11.5 KTS ABT 16.5 MT VLSFO
IF BOILER USED PLUS 1.0 MT/D VLSFO
IN PORT:
(IDLE) ABT 2.5 MT VLSFO
(WORKING) ABT 4.0 MT VLSFO
BUNKER GRADES:
--------------------
VLSFO / ISO SPECS 2010
LSMGO DMA / ISO SPECS 2010
VESSEL WARRANTED TO PERFORM IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ONLY, DEFINED AS UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4
AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3, EVEN KEEL, NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, NO ADVERSE SWELL.
IN E.U. PORTS AND OTHER SECA AREAS THE VESSEL MUST BURN LSMGO (MAX 0.1% S) AS PER LATEST ECA/MARPOL RULES.
VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO CONSUME MGO/MDO AND/OR EXTRA IFO WHEN:
ENTERING-LEAVING PORTS, WHILST ON ROADS - ANCHORAGE, UNDER PILOTAGE, BERTHING/UNBERTHING,
WHILE BALLAST WATER EXCHANGE , HOLD'S CLEANING, NAVIGATING/MANOEUVERING IN CONFINED / SHALLOW /
CONGESTED/RESTRICTED WATERS, RIVERS, CHANNEL, WHEN NAVIGATING IN FOG.
SPEED / CONSUMPTION IS ALWAYS GIVEN ON ABOUT BASIS. ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN ABOUT 0.5 KNOTS
DOWNWARDS IN THE SPEED AND ABOUT 5PCT UPWARDS IN THE CONSUMPTION IN ALL CASES.
